backlog.title: Set up development environment
backlog.description: Install and configure React Native or Flutter for mobile app development.

backlog.title: Secure OpenAI API access
backlog.description: Obtain and configure API keys for OpenAI integration.

backlog.title: Design initial UI wireframes
backlog.description: Create initial wireframes for chatroom and persona profiles.

backlog.title: Develop detailed persona profiles
backlog.description: Create detailed descriptions and dialogue examples for each persona inspired by Friends characters.

backlog.title: Implement basic chat interface
backlog.description: Develop frontend UI for real-time synchronous chat.

backlog.title: Integrate OpenAI GPT for dynamic responses
backlog.description: Set up dynamic persona responses adapted to user input scenarios.

backlog.title: Develop crisis detection mechanism
backlog.description: Implement real-time AI-based crisis keyword detection and referral pop-ups.

backlog.title: Ensure privacy and compliance
backlog.description: Ensure anonymous session management, no data retention, and compliance with GDPR and CCPA.

backlog.title: Implement feedback mechanism
backlog.description: Create simple emoji-based feedback system for users post-session.

backlog.title: Internal alpha testing and bug fixing
backlog.description: Conduct internal tests to identify and resolve bugs before MVP launch.

backlog.title: Prepare for app store launch
backlog.description: Create necessary assets and descriptions for app store listings.

backlog.title: Launch MVP to public
backlog.description: Deploy app to iOS and Android app stores and monitor initial user interactions.
